content: Airdrop SubmarineLand Metaverse💵 Reward: 10 SMNReferral count is unlimitedEarn BNB (1%) and SMN (5%) for every airdrop or presale bought through your referral linkCLAIM SMN💰Reward pool: limited✅Claim ->app.submarine.landSubmarine Land is a multi-platform and cross-reality ecosystem for true immersion and qualitative interaction with the game world.Various platforms will be implemented in stages.#Gamefi #NFT

comments.author: TRTFINANCE
comments.body: ABOUT SUBMARINELANDSubmarine Land is a Maritime space in a Deep Ocean that brings together various characters of all shades. They include Captains, blockchain enthusiasts, and other diverse personalities with different interests, senses of purpose, and backgrounds.Submarine Atlantis is the capital of our Earth, a 3D virtual city that is located in the middle of limitless space. The city attracts users from any corner to meet and interact there. They live their vibrant lives: visiting NFT events and museums, scheduling regular or business meetings, buying land to build agricultural factories, and owning property.The main traditional attraction of the citizens of Submarine Atlantis is the Submarine Arena. By fighting in their NFT submarines, residents earn money and more importantly enjoy the game.VISIONSubmarineLand is a cross-platform game to earn SUBM. where players will fight for SUBM. The SUBM token is given as a battle reward. SUBM will be exchangeable in our city of the metaverse atlantis for market items.MISSIONSubmarine Metaverse is a distant maritime space that brings together several characters of all shades. Among them are degens, gamers, blockchainenthusiasts and other diverse personalities with different interests, the Atlantis city attracts users from all corners to meet and interact there.REWARDING OUR HOLDERSA percentage of every transaction made is automatically distributed to our holders addresses with reflections, to incentives holding $SMN long term, and reward our holders. As the project grows, so will the reflection rate.Only 20 lucky participants of our vip sale will receive a legendary NFT. Holders who have more than 52,000 $SMN will participate in the voting process.TOKENOMICS✅VIP ROUND: 3% ✅SEED: 3% ✅PRIVATE SALE: 11%✅PUBLIC SALE: 9%✅FOUNDERS & TEAM: 6%✅ADVISORS: 3%✅MARKETING: 10% ✅DEVELOPMENT: 10% ✅LIQUIDITY & FARMING: 15%✅ECOSYSTEM: 20%✅RESERVE: 10% ✅Total supply:  1.500.000.000✅Locked LP: 365 dayℹ️ Token name: submarineLandℹ️ Symbol: SMN📝 Contract: 0x4A9E289a8375e33388bbeC8FFaaD4d71EdE63d2D📅 Launched: 31/08/2022🗨  https://t.me/SubmarineLand🌐  https://submarine.land/📍 https://twitter.com/Submarineland1📠 admin@submarine.land
